'''Meal For Two''' is an [[Achievement]] in the category ''[[Wonders of the World]]''. To complete this achievement, the player needs to let Xudong and Kamei Munehisa finish their dishes first once each in the commission ''[[The Gourmet Supremos: Cook-Off]].'' This does not require choosing both of their versions.
